resources.string: ✓ A passionate web developer exploring the edges of ""MEAN"" stack.
✓ Proficient in building end-to-end JavaScript web applications.
✓ Have a strong appetite to learn new technologies in a short span and implement independently.
✓ Past technical exp.: Android, PHP, WordPress.
✓ Webmaster @""OffbeatWriting"" | Responsible for managing technical content @""OffbeatWriting"".
✓ Humble and a great friend in need.
✓ MCKV INSTITUTE OF ENGINEERING (2015-19)"\n"B.TECH-Computer Science Engineering"\n"8.08 DGPA
✓ Tata Consultancy Services, Bangalore (Jun 2019–present)."\n"Assistant System Engineer."\n"Responsible for developing MEAN Stack web application.
✓ Groupclap Edtech, Kolkata (Jan 2019–Mar 2019)."\n"Intern (Developer)."\n"Worked on multiple technology stacks like WebApp, Android App, Wordpress and Laravel.
✓ Vedas Technocrats, Kolkata (Feb 2018–Jun 2018)."\n"Intern(Android Developer)."\n"Developed Front-end of many apps.
